title: Alkoxyhydrosilane-facilitated cross-etherification reaction of secondary benzyl alcohol with aliphatic alcohol: synthesis of unsymmetrical dialkyl ethers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31467-31470
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05997B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Toru Hashimoto, Yakumo Matsunaga, Yuki Okamura, Sosuke Takao, Makoto Hojo
Alkoxyhydorosilane is found to be an effective mediator for the cross-etherification reaction between two distinct alcohols, providing the unsymmetrical dialkyl ethers in good-to-high yields.
